description: Make this speedy chicken curry recipe when you're after something quick, warming and flavourful for dinner. Serve with a side of rice or naan.
name: Chicken Curry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 cup Farmers Union Greek Style Yogurt
4 tbs Farmers Union Greek style yogurt

recipeInstructions.text: Cover and simmer for a further 10-15 minutes, until the colour deepens to a rich red. Serve, garnished with coriander and a large dollop of FUGY.
